title: Exposed
description:
Brian Babylon, Eddie Brill and Jenna Brister share stories about Hitler, a long lost son, and short and scary marriage.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Eddie Brill, Ruby Boots, Jenna Brister, Sheryl Crow, Jeff Barr, Brian Babylon, kevin Allison, The Budos Band)
